PageTitle: ptp announce-drop enable (port extension interface view)
FuncDef:
The ptp announce-drop enable command enables a 1588v2 interface to drop Announce packets.
The undo ptp announce-drop enable command enables a 1588v2 interface to accept Announce packets and send responses.
A 1588v2 interface accepts Announce packets and sends responses by default.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Two devices exchange Announce packets to determine the master/slave relationship. The master device sends Sync packets to notify the slave device of time signal parameters and uses a delay measurement mechanism to achieve time signals accuracy.
After 1588v2 is enabled globally on a device, all interfaces on the device send and receive Announce packets. Some interfaces do not participate in time synchronization and do not need to receive Announce packets that may affect the transmission of other services. To disable these interfaces from receiving Announce packets, run the ptp announce-drop enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
